long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Heidi is a world-class AI-powered medical scribe designed to redefine clinical documentation. We automate the creation of comprehensive clinical notes and letters during encounters. Heidi enables every clinician to devote more time to their patient’s care and less to paperwork.


Key Features:

- Free Note Generation: Create detailed progress notes at no cost. Pay only for pro features like custom templates and the 'Ask Heidi' functionality.

- Accurate Transcriptions: Generate detailed progress notes, referral letters, and handover documents with a single click.

- Seamless Integration: Effortlessly integrate with EHR systems across the world like Epic, Best Practice, Athena and more for a smooth workflow.

- Template Library: Access thousands of templates, including those tailored to every medical specialty, ensuring consistency and efficiency.

- Custom Templates: Utilize and share successful templates tailored to your specialty, ensuring consistency and efficiency.

- Multilingual Support: Easily create notes in your patient’s preferred language, enhancing communication and care.


Benefits:

- Enhanced Patient Interaction: Spend more time engaging with patients and less time on documentation.

- Improved Accuracy: Leverage AI to minimize errors and inconsistencies in medical records.

- Reduced Burnout: Reduce your pyjama time, no more writing notes after work, reducing stress and improving job satisfaction.

- Revenue Generating: Connect Heidi to other workflows including billing, coding, revenue cycle and patient follow-up to not only save time but also generate revenue.


Security and Compliance:

Heidi is committed to ensuring the privacy and security of your data. Our Chrome extension processes all data locally within your browser and does not remotely scrape or transfer any data from the web pages you visit while using the extension. The processing of information occurs solely on your device, and we do not transmit any data from these web pages to Heidi Health servers. Data provided by Heidi is solely pushed to your system to enhance functionality without compromising your privacy. 

Heidi also adheres to the highest data privacy and security standards, including compliance with HIPAA, the NHS, GDPR, PIPEDA, APP and ISO 27001, ensuring that all patient information is handled with the utmost care and confidentiality. 

Join the growing community of healthcare professionals who trust Heidi to enhance their workflow, saving time and improving patient engagement.

Transform your practice with the power of AI – transcribe consults, generate documents, and discover a new way of working with Heidi.
